name: 類神經網路
description:
Advanced study on Artificial Neural Networks (ANN), focusing on understanding biological nervous systems and developing computational techniques for ANN, this course covers a wide 
range of research problems encountered within ANN and provides detailed algorithmic and theoretical treatments for each. 本課程主要介紹類神經網路相關處理技術。這門課程廣泛的探討與類神經網路有關的研究問題，並為這些問題提供了詳細的演算法和理論分析。
goals: Build theoretical concepts of artificial neural networks (ANN)
syllabus:
Ch.1: Introduction to ANS Technology (weeks 1, 2)

Ch.2: Adaline and Madaline (weeks 2, 3)

Ch.3: Backpropagation (BP) Neural Network (weeks 4, 5) 

Ch.4: Convolutional Neural Networks (CNN) (week 6)

Ch.5: Recurrent Neural Networks (RNN) (week 7)

Ch.6: Learning Strategies (week 8)

Ch.7: AM and BAM (weeks 9)

Mid-term Exam (week 10)

Ch.8: Hopfield Neural Model (weeks 11, 12)

Ch.9: Autoencoders (week 13)

Ch.10: Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) (week 14) 

Ch.11: Boltzmann Machines (weeks 15, 16)

Project Presentation (weeks 17, 18)
